The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 October is 584,843 (1,039 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 12 October, there were 92,386 new confirmed cases (164.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 October, there were 75,520 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 22% ( 16,866 extra cases).
